ps3.7:1.1_0: has rightly explained about all things, and when they’re not ugly, gone beyond doubt, got rid of the stain of wisdom.
ps3.7:2.1_0: Unskilled in the principle of the skillful, and the eighteen bases of psychic power are skillful.
ps3.7:2.2_0: toss out the past, future, and present. He teaches sensual desire, ill will, dullness and drowsiness, restlessness, and remorse, and doubt.
ps3.7:2.3_0: A mendicant whose path is cut off, cut off, and of all parts.
ps3.7:3.1_0: His hands and feet cling to the cessation of sensual desire, ill will, dullness and drowsiness, restlessness, and remorse, and doubt. My dullness and drowsiness filled with dullness and drowsiness, restlessness and remorse, and remorse, and doubt.
ps3.7:3.2_0: With the cessation of perfection, she becomes corrupted.
ps3.7:4.2_0: But the path to perfection, they don’t attend on all at once.
ps3.7:5.2_0: who has given up all defilements on to perfection.
ps3.7:6.2_0: The heads, awakening, is liberation, overcome by greed, bondage, approving, attachment, and craving for choices. Being devoted, they establish mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ps3.7:6.3_0: The discussion on serenity is finished.
